onboarding.slideOne_title:
Payments and
payment requests
on the XRP Ledger
onboarding.slideTwo_desc: Add multiple accounts, in Full Access or Read-Only mode. Send transactions and sign requests with your Full Access accounts.
onboarding.slideThree_desc: Security is priority with XUMM app and platform. Never enter your secret key again! Sign transactions from your own trusted device.
onboarding.slideFour_desc: You can send and receive XRP as well as other trusted assets (IOUs)
onboarding.v2homepage_noacc2: Import your existing account or create a new account.

setupPasscode.passCodeDescription: We use the passcode to unlock the app, confirm settings and keep your account secure.
setupPasscode.warnNeedPasscode: You will need your passcode to unlock the app
setupPasscode.UnableToStoreThePasscode: Unable to store the passcode. This should not happen. A bug report was sent to the Xaman support team. Please contact us at support@xaman.app for more information.
setupPasscode.weakPasscodeDescription: The selected passcode is easy to guess. We recommend you to choose a stronger one.

setupBiometry.biometryDescription: To keep your account more secure you can activate the use of FaceID or TouchID.

setupPermissions.permissionDescription: We use push notifications to send you sign requests
setupPermissions.pushRegisterError: It seems we couldn't enable push notifications at this moment. You can activate them later in the app settings under Settings -> Advance. No worries, you can continue with the setup for now!

setupTermOfService.XamanNotCustodialExplain:
Xaman is a non-custodial wallet, meaning your funds aren't in Xaman custody, but 'live' on the XRP Ledger.

Only you can access your funds with your account secrets, as generated by Xaman or imported into Xaman.

This means Xaman and the Xaman team cannot access and cannot recover your funds if you make a mistake or lose your secret keys.
setupTermOfService.KeepYourSecretsSafeExplain:
You and you alone are responsible for keeping them safe, offline.

Write down your backups at multiple offline locations.
setupTermOfService.IWillKeepMySecretsSafeAndOffline: I will keep my secret keys safe and offline.
setupTermOfService.transactionsArePermanentExplain:
Xaman cannot revert transactions or recover funds if you make a mistake.

Transactions are instant and irreversible.
setupTermOfService.iAmResponsibleForKeepingMyKeysAndFundsSa: I'm responsible for keeping my keys and funds safe
setupTermOfService.yourFundsLiveOnTheXRPLedger: Your funds 'live' on the XRP Ledger
setupTermOfService.yourFundsLiveOnTheXRPLedgerExplain:
Xaman is an XRPL client application. 

This means your XRP does not reside with Xaman.

Transactions are sent and received live on/by the XRPL.
setupTermOfService.myFundsAreRegisteredOnTheXRPLedger: My funds are registered on the XRP Ledger, not inside Xaman.
setupTermOfService.neverShareYourSecret: NEVER share your account's secret keys!
setupTermOfService.neverShareYourSecretExplain:
Xaman and the Xaman Support team will NEVER ask for your secret account key.

If someone does, or asks you to enter your private key somewhere, you are being SCAMMED!

Please contact us ASAP with as much information as you have about the incident.
setupTermOfService.IWillNeverGiveMySecretsToAnyone: I will never give my secrets to anyone and never enter it elsewhere
setupTermOfService.whenYouChangeYourPhoneExplain: To ensure security, Xaman will ask you to import all your accounts again using your secret key when you get a new or replacement phone.
setupTermOfService.IWillKeepMySecretsSafeSoICanReEnterThemI: I will keep my secret numeric account keys safely offline so I can re-enter them if I get a new phone.
setupTermOfService.questionsAndSupportExplain:
Please read our FAQ. Have more questions? Contact us at https://support.xaman.app.

This is our official, trusted channel for XUMM support. Beware, other channels may be fraudulent!
setupTermOfService.IOnlyTrustAnswersFromXamanSupportTeam: I will ONLY trust answers from the Official Xaman Support Team at https://support.xaman.app
setupTermOfService.pleaseReadTheTextAboveCarefully: Please read the text above carefully

home.howActivateMyAccount: How can I activate my account?
home.otherAssetsDesc: The XRP ledger also allows you to hold balances of, and to send or receive, other non-XRP tokens. These tokens can be issued by other accounts on the XRP ledger. If you want to be able to send or receive a non-XRP token, you will have to trust the issuer of these tokens.
home.emptyAccountAddFirstAccount: It's a little bit empty here. Add your first account.
home.shareReadonlyAccountWarning: Do you own the keys to this Read-Only account or is this your Exchange account?
home.exchangeAccountReadonlyExplain: You cannot deposit directly to your account on the exchange. You need a destination tag to do so. Please get your account's destination tag from the exchange, and deposit manually.

account.addAccountDescription: Import your existing account or create a new one.
account.confirmPrivateDescription: Please provide the numbers, this is for your own safety: we want you to confirm you wrote it down.
account.YouJustCreatedAccount: Congrats! You've created a new account.
account.pleaseEnterSafePassword: Create an extended length password that is easy to remember but impossible for others to guess.
account.passwordShouldContain: Your password strength should be at least Fair, please use a longer or more difficult password (long passwords are better).
account.chooseWisely: Please choose the security level that suits this account
account.passcodeOptionDesc: This is ideal for daily spending. You can sign transactions by simply showing your face, scanning your finger or entering your passcode.
account.passwordOptionDesc: This is better for long-term storage of XRP and requires a password to sign transactions.
account.hereIsYourPublicKey: Here's your new account. You can receive funds to the generated public account address.
account.publicKeyCopiedToClipboard: Account address copied to the clipboard
account.writeDownPrivateKey: Please be sure to write down all the rows on paper and keep it somewhere safe! If your device crashes and you don't have the secret numeric key anymore, your funds are LOST!
account.privateKeyRowsDesc: Only you can touch your funds, but you will have to keep your secret numeric key safe. Your secret account key consists of 8 rows (labeled A-H) containing 6 digits per row.
account.neverSharePrivateKey: Never share your secret numeric account key with anyone else. If you do, you may lose access to your funds!
account.pleaseWriteDownAllNumbers: Please write down all the numbers
account.goBackClearTheInput:
Are you sure you want to go back?
(input will be cleared for security reasons)
account.goBackRefillTheInput:
Are you sure you want to go back?
(you have to re-fill all the inputs for security reasons)
account.pleaseSelectAccountSecretType: Please select your account secret type.
account.tangemCardEmptyGenerateWalletAlert: Your Tangem card does not contain an XRP Ledger account yet. To use this card, an account will have to be generated by the card.
account.tangemLongTapExplain: This mechanism protects the card against proximity attacks by enforcing a delay between reception and execution of commands.
account.tangemPasscodeExplain: Before the execution of any command entailing a change of the state of the card, you will have to enter the passcode.
account.tangemAccessCodeExplain: Before the execution of any command, you will have to enter the access code.
account.tangemNFCNotSupportedDeviceAlert: Using Tangem cards requires NFC capabilities. Your phone does not seem to support NFC.
account.youCanAlwaysGetFullAccess: You can upgrade a Read-Only account to Full Access later on.
account.secretNumbersDesc: Preferred account type: 8 rows of 6 digits
account.pleaseProvideAccountAddress:
Please provide your account address 
(Starts with 'r...')
account.pleaseEnterAllWords: Please enter all your mnemonic words!
account.pleaseProvideMnemonic: Please provide your Mnemonic (24 words) for your account.
account.howManyWordsYourMnemonicIs: How many words does your mnemonic have?
account.invalidHexPrivateKey: Invalid HEX private key! HEX private keys should be 66 HEX characters (A-F, 0-9) long.
account.pleaseProvideFamilySeed: Please provide your account secret (Family Seed) or 66 HEX char. private key.
account.pleaseEnterYourFamilySeed: Enter your Family Seed / Private Key
account.pleaseChooseAccountLabel: Please enter a name for this account (e.g. 'Spending' or 'Savings').
account.accessLevelChangeAlert: Changing from Read Only to Full Access mode will require you to enter the secret key for your account
account.getStartedCreateAccount: Get started by adding your first account.
account.accountSettingsDescription: You can edit your account settings or account label here.
account.upgradingAccessLevelWarning: You are upgrading your access level. You need to import your private key for this account.
account.downgradingAccessLevelWarning: You are downgrading your access level. This will cause you to lose your private key for this account. Are you sure?
account.downgradingAccessLevelWarningPhysical: You are downgrading your access level. Are you sure?
account.removeTrustLineWarning: You are removing this asset from your account. This action cannot be undone! Sure you want to proceed?
account.unavailableChangeSecurityLevel: Sorry! You can't change your security level right now.
account.accountRemoveWarning: Your account will be permanently deleted from Xaman! Are you sure?
account.accountMaxLabelLengthError: Account label should be less than 16 characters!
account.accountLabelCannotBeMoreThan: Account label cannot be more than 64 characters!
account.activateRegularKeyAccountWarning:
If you want to use this account as Regular key only, you DO NOT have to activate the account.

However, if you want to use this account also to transact, you can activate this account.
account.selectedAccountIsNotActivatedPleaseChoos: The selected account is not activated. To sign this transaction you need to select an activated account!
account.importingSecretAccountExist:
The account secret that you have entered belongs to this r-address and has already been imported into Xaman as a full access account.

%{address}
account.upgradeAccountSecretIsNotMatch: The secret numeric account key entered belongs to another r-address. If you want to import a regular key, please [import new account]. If not, please [cancel] and check your entry.
account.masterKeyForThisAccountDisableRegularKey: The master key for this account is disabled and the regular key account was not found in the accounts list!
account.regularKeyAccountForThisAccountDoesNotIm: The Regular Key for this account was not imported with sign access!
account.currentPasswordShouldNotBeEmpty: Current Password should not be empty!
account.enteredCurrentPasswordIsInvalid: The current password you entered is invalid!
account.allDoneYouCanGoToNextStepNow: All done! Go to the next step
account.disableMasterKeyWarning: The transaction DISABLES the private key for the account. This may lock you out. Continue only if you are absolutely sure this is what you want and you understand what you are doing!
account.mnemonicLargeAmountAlert: If importing your mnemonic account while it holds significant value (eg. your life savings, larger amounts of XRP or other tokens), please consider creating a new one in Xaman to keep your mnemonic account safely offline.
account.importExchangeAddressReadonlyWarning:
It is not possible to import your Exchange (deposit) account. Doing so does not allow you to track your own balance on the exchange. 

Importing a Read-Only account only works if this is your own activated account, like one on your hardware wallet.
account.readOnlyAccountSpendableBalanceWarning: Please note: The access level for this account is Read-Only. There is currently no way to sign transactions that can affect the account state in any form.
account.deleteAccountWarning: This is an Account Delete transaction. Upon signing, your account will be deleted and all your remaining funds (except for the XRPL account deletion fee of %{ownerReserve} XRP in reserve) will be sent to the configured destination. Please check the destination address twice and ONLY continue if you ACTUALLY want to delete your XRPL account!
account.deleteAccountObjectsExistError: You cannot delete this account as it contains specific XRPL objects such as other assets, Decentralized Exchange offers, and/or Escrows (as creator or beneficiary).
account.deleteAccountSequenceIsNotEnoughError: This account cannot cannot be deleted yet. It takes %{remainingSequence} more ledgers to close before this account can be deleted.
account.unableToCheckAccountObjects: Unable to check account objects. Please make sure you are connected to the XRPL node.
account.unableToCheckAccountNFTs: Unable to check for account NFTs, please make sure you are connected to the XRP ledger node
account.unableToFetchLedgerSequence: Unable to fetch current ledger sequence. Please make sure you are connected to the XRPL node.
account.unableGetDestinationAccountInfo: Unable to get the destination account´s info, please make sure you are connected to the XRP ledger node
account.unableGetAccountInfo: Unable to fetch account info, please make sure you are connected to the XRP ledger node
account.destinationAccountIsNotActivated: This destination account is not activated. The destination account must be a funded account in the XRP Ledger.
account.destinationAddressRequiredDestinationTag: Destination address requires a Destination Tag
account.destinationAccountAndSourceCannotBeSame: Destination account and source cannot be the same.
account.accountGenerateActivationExplain: Account activation is a requirement on the XRP Ledger. To activate it, you will have to make a first deposit of at least %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset}.
account.accountImportActivationExplain: You imported a new account on the XRP Ledger. The account is not activated. Account activation is a requirement on the XRP Ledger. To activate, you will have to make a first deposit of at least %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset}.
account.accountActivateReserveExplain: The first %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset} deposited into your account cannot be spent but held as reserve to keep your account active and pay for XRPL fees.
account.accountReserveNotShownExplain: Your reserved %{nativeAsset} will not show up as balance in Xaman, but you can view your reserve with the "Explain my balance" button in the home screen, above your %{nativeAsset} balance.
account.thisAddressAppearsToBeExchangeAddress:
This address appears to belong to an Exchange. Are you sure you want to continue?

If you wish to continue sending to this address, please be sure understand & abide by the terms and conditions of your Exchange.
account.accountDestroyWarning: Your account will be deleted PERMANENTLY, are you sure?
account.unableToHideAllAccountsError: Unable to hide this account. At least one account should be visible.
account.unableToHideDefaultAccountError: Unable to hide this default account. Change default account and try again.
account.tapAndHoldToReorder: Tap and hold to reprioritize an item.
account.toTurnYourSecretIntoXrplLedgerAccountPle: Please enter your secret to turn it into an XRP Ledger account.
account.yourXRPLedgerAccountIsGoingToBe: Your XRP Ledger account is going to be:
account.importSecretWithoutChecksumWarning:
If you continue, you will import an XRP Ledger account from Secret Numbers. The Secret Numbers should be generated **by you** using an offline method (eg. with dice). You **must** have stored your generated secret numbers (eg. stamped in metal, written down).
ONLY CONTINUE IF YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING.
account.tangemCardPasscodeSetWarning:
While adding a passcode to your card improves the safety of your funds in case of a lost (and found) card, it is important to realize that your funds will be INACCESSIBLE and *CANNOT* BE RECOVERED (by anyone) if you don't remember your passcode.

Are you really sure you want to add a passcode to your card?
account.tangemCardAccessCodeSetWarning:
While adding a access code to your card improves the safety of your funds in case of a lost (and found) card, it is important to realize that your funds will be INACCESSIBLE and CAN *NOT* BE RECOVERED (by anyone) if you don't remember your access code.

Are you really sure you want to add a access code to your card?
account.thereAreAccountsEligibleToSign: There are %{signersCount} accounts eligible to sign. Which one do you want to sign with?
account.signatureVerificationExplain: To verify if your Tangem card is working correctly and able to sign transactions, we will perform one signing routine to verify transaction signatures generated by your card.
account.yourXRPLedgerAccountWillNotBeTouched: Your XRP Ledger account & funds will not be touched.
account.checkWhichAccountsNeedBetterEncryption: Check which accounts need better encryption
account.whyUseThisNewEncryptionMethod: Why use this new encryption method?
account.newEncryptionExplain: Our encryption & security is enhanced to new standards AES256 GCM. You should encrypt your account with this new method to be extra safe. Although you are already safe, it can't hurt to upgrade to the new standards.
account.doNotTurnOffYourPhoneOrQuiteWhileMigrati: Don't turn off your phone or quit the app while doing the encryption.
account.unableToFetchAccountNFTokens: Unable to fetch the account NFT's. Please make sure you are connected to the XRP Ledger node.

send.amountIsBiggerThanYourSpend: This amount exceeds your spendable balance (%{spendable})
send.theMaxAmountYouCanSendIs: The maximum amount you can send is %{spendable} %{currency}
send.theMaxAmountYouCanSendWithFee: The issuer of %{currency} charges a transfer fee. The max. amount you can send (fee included) is %{spendable} %{currency}.
send.trustLineIsFrozenByIssuer: Your Trust Line for the requested asset (%{currency}) has been frozen by the issuer. Please contact the issuer of the asset.
send.balanceIsNotEnoughForFee: Top up your balance to cover the fee (%{fee})
send.sourceAndDestinationCannotBeSame: Source and Destination addresses cannot be the same!
send.enterANameOrAddress: Enter a name or an address
send.transferredSuccessfully: Your transaction has been successfully registered on the %{network}.
send.verificationFailedDescription:
Your transaction has been signed and submitted successfully, however, we could not confirm transaction finality.

This can be caused by an internet connection hiccup or increased load on the XRP Ledger node you are connected to.

Please manually verify if this transaction shows in your transaction history (Events).
send.invalidDestinationTag: Invalid Destination Tag QR code! Scan a new one or try again.
send.destinationIsConfirmedAsScam: The destiantion account is confirmed as SCAM
send.destinationIsProbableIsScam: The destination account is flagged as high risk
send.selectedAccountDoNotSupportAsset: The selected account does not support the selected asset.
send.memoPublicWarning: Warning: Memo information is publicly accessible!
send.destinationNotExistTooLittleToCreate: The destination account hasn't been used before and doesn't have a balance. To activate an account on the XRPL, an initial deposit of at least %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset} is required.
send.destinationNotExistCreationWarning:
Sending to the given destination account may be risky: it has never been used and has a zero balance, which is commonly seen in scams. We advise verifying the owner's authenticity to safeguard your assets. If you're confident in its safety but aware of the risks.

If you continue sending to this account, %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset} of the %{amount} %{nativeAsset} will be used to activate the account on the XRP ledger.
send.destinationCannotActivateWithIOU: The destination account hasn't been used before and doesn't have any balance. To activate an account on the XRPL, an initial deposit of at least %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset} has to be sent to that account. Non-%{nativeAsset} assets cannot be used for the initial deposit.
send.destinationTagIsRequired: The destination tag is required to send this payment.
send.unableGetRecipientAccountInfoPleaseTryAg: Unable to get recipient account info. Please try again.
send.unableToSetFeesPleaseTryAgain: Unable to set transaction fees, please try again.
send.theDestinationAccountIsSetAsBlackHole: WARNING: This destination account is set as a black hole. Any XRP sent to this account will result in loss of funds!
send.thisAddressRequiredDestinationTag: This address requires a Destination Tag
send.unableToSendPaymentRecipientDoesNotHaveT: Unable to send the token to the recipient! The recipient does not have a token TrustLine established with its issuer.
send.unableToSendPaymentTrustLineLimitIsExcee:
Unable to send the token to the recipient.
The 'Limit' for the amount of tokens the recipient wants to hold is exceeded. The recipient will have to update their TrustLine for the token you're sending with a higher 'Limit' to be able to receive this token.
send.destinationTagWarningConfirm: You are sending to an account with a destination tag. Please double check the destination tag: if you send using the wrong tag, you will need to contact the support team of the destination account in order  to recover your funds.
send.sendToAccountWithDisallowNativeAssetFlag: The destination account indicates that it doesn't want to receive %{nativeAsset} payments. Only non-%{nativeAsset} payments can be sent to this destination.
send.unableToSendPaymentNotEnoughLiquidity: Unable to send the payment right now due to a lack of liquidity.
send.addressIsUnderInvestigationPleaseCancel: is under investigation. Please cancel this transaction.
send.toContinueProvideReasonInYourOwnWords: To continue (not recommended) provide a reason in your own words:
send.pleaseEnterYourReasonToContinue: Please enter your reason to continue

asset.selectAnExchangeAndSelectAsset: Select an issuer and asset you would like to add. This list is maintained by the Xaman team.
asset.successRemoved: Asset successfully removed from your account!
asset.trustLineDustRemoveWarning: This TrustLine still contains a really small balance of %{balance} %{currency}. If you continue, this amount will be sent back to the issuer before your TrustLine is deleted.
asset.dustAmountRemovedYouCanRemoveTrustLineNo: Your dust balance has been sent back to the issuer. The TrustLine can now be removed.
asset.addingAssetReserveDescription: Adding a token to your account will increase your enforced account reserve by %{ownerReserve} %{nativeAsset}
asset.unableToRemoveAssetNotInDefaultState: This asset cannot be removed from your account either because the issuer added specific settings on this asset or because the issuing account is not properly configured.
asset.ripplingMisconfigurationWarning: Rippling not turned off for this Trust Line, if you don't know what this is and/or this is not on purpose, please update this setting to prevent potential loss of %{token} tokens
asset.lineLimitMisconfigurationWarning: This TrustLine has a limit of zero (0) configured, meaning other cannot send this token to you: you can only hold the token. To be able to receive this token as well, Xaman can update your TrustLine to remove the zero (0) TrustLine limit.
asset.addingTrustLineWarning:
XRPL Labs / Xaman does not endorse any token or token issuer. You should only proceed if you trust the token issuer.
In case of questions or problems regarding the token (TrustLine) you will need to contact the token issuer.

Continue at your own risk.
asset.trustLineIsAlreadyExist: This token already exists. You cannot add the same token again.
asset.issuerAddressCopiedToClipboard: Issuer address copied to the clipboard
asset.unableToLoadListOfTokens: Unable to load the list of tokens!
asset.copyIssuerAddressWarning:
%{issuerAddress}

You are about to copy the Issuer Address. Please note that sending assets to the issuer address will PERMANENTLY BURN THE TOKENS. The Issuer Address for an asset should only be used to verify the legitimacy of the asset.

exchange.doYouWantToExchange: Are you sure you want to exchange %{payAmount} %{payCurrency} for %{getAmount} %{getCurrency}?
exchange.failedExchange: Due to insufficient liquidity or updated rates, exchanges are currently unavailable.
exchange.liquidityIsNotEnough: Insufficient liquidity, cannot exchange right now!
exchange.liquidityIsNotSoMuch: There's relatively low liquidity. You can still continue, but you may not get the best rate for your entire exchange!
exchange.theMaxAmountYouCanExchangeIs: The maximum amount you can exchange is %{spendable} %{currency}
exchange.exchangeByThirdPartyMessage: If you want to create an offer for execution at a requested price level, you can use the Xaman-enabled third party XRP Toolkit application to create a limit order.
exchange.requestedLiquidityNotAvailable: The amount cannot be exchanged. There are not enough offers available on the Decentralized Exchange.
exchange.reverseLiquidityNotAvailable: The amount can't be exchanged: based on the lack of offers on the Decentralized Exchange, you would not be able to exchange it back.
exchange.maxSpreadExceeded: The price difference (spread) between selling and buying offers is too high.
exchange.maxSlippageExceeded: The exchange rate may be unfavorable as there are not enough diverse offers on the Decentralized Exchange.
exchange.maxReverseSlippageExceeded: The exchange rate may be unfavorable if you try to exchange back as there are currently not enough diverse offers on the Decentralized Exchange.
exchange.slippageSpreadWarning:
The exchange rate displayed is an estimate based on the current offers available on the XRP Ledger Decentralized Exchange.
When you execute this trade and the liquidity changes while executing your transaction, you may get an up to %{slippage}% worse exchange rate. Please continue only if you accept this.

scan.scannedQRIsNotAccountAddress: Scanned QR code is not a valid %{nativeAsset} address!
scan.theClipboardDataIsNotContainAccountAddre: The clipboard data does not contain a valid %{nativeAsset} address!
scan.scannedQRIsNotXamanPayload: The scanned QR code is not a Xaman payload!
scan.theClipboardDataIsNotContainXamanPayload: The clipboard data does not contain valid Xaman payload!
scan.invalidQRTryNewOneOrTryAgain: Invalid QR code (for Xaman). Scan a new one or try again.
scan.invalidClipboardDateTryNewOneOrTryAgain: Invalid Xaman clipboard data. Please confirm and try again.

payload.UnableVerifyPayload: Unable to verify the payload signature
payload.payloadAlreadyResolved: This payload has already been signed or rejected. Please repeat the process that generated the request and scan the new one.
payload.payloadExpired: This payload has expired. Please repeat the process that generated the request and scan the new one.
payload.payloadAlreadySigned: The payload has already been signed
payload.invalidOrMissingSignedTransactionBlob: Invalid or missing signed transaction BLOB!
payload.unexpectedPayloadErrorOccurred: The payload is invalid and will be automatically rejected.
payload.whatDoYouWantToDo: What do you want to do?
payload.willIgnoreTheRequestAndClose: Will ignore the request and close.
payload.notEnoughLiquidityToSendThisPayment: Not enough liquidity to send this payment.
payload.unableToCheckAssetConversion: Unable to verify the token exchange rate. Please make sure you are properly connected to the Internet.
payload.unableToGetNetworkFee: Unable to get the network fee, please make sure you are connected to the XRPL node
payload.checkCanOnlyCashByCheckDestination: A check can only be cashed if the check destination account is present in Xaman in Read/Write (or Regulary Key) mode.
payload.unableToGetCheckObject: Unable to get check object. Please make sure you are connected to the XRPL node.
payload.checkObjectDoesNotExist: Unable to get the Check object. Please make sure the Check exists on the XRP Ledger.
payload.nonExpiredCheckCanOnlyCancelByCreatedAcc: A (non-expired) check can only be cancelled by either the destination account or the one that created it.
payload.accountDeleteExchangeSupportWarning: Note: When deleting your XRPL account and sending the remaining balance to an Exchange, make sure the destination  Exchange supports deposits using 'AccountDelete' transactions. Not all do! This results in having to contact the Exchange support team to get your funds credited to your account.
payload.notVettedTokenTradeWarning:
Trade at your own risk! The token you are about to trade **has not been vetted**.

Anyone can create a token, including creating fake versions of existing tokens that claim to represent projects. If you trade this token, you may not be able to sell it back. You are potentially putting your assets/savings at risk!
payload.tradeEntireTokenWorthWarning: Warning: the amount of %{currency} is equal to or higher than your %{currency} balance of this asset. If this offer is executed, you will fully liquidate your %{currency} position.
payload.paymentToDisallowedNativeAssetWarning: The destination account configured their account to disallow incoming %{nativeAsset} (non-token) payments. If you proceed, you will most likely need support from the destination account owner.
payload.paymentToBlackHoledAccountWarning: The destination account is 'black holed', meaning all funds sent to the destination account will be inaccessible & unrecoverable. Are you sure you want to continue sending your funds to this destination account?
payload.unableToFindTheOfferObject: Unable to find the offer object!
payload.theIssuerCanBurnThisToken: Note: The issuer can burn this token.
payload.payloadForceNetworkError: This payload is not available on the network you are connected with
payload.pleaseSwitchToNetworkAndTryAgain: Please switch to %{network} and try again
payload.oracleDocumentIdCopiedToClipboard: Oracle Document Id copied to clipboard
payload.didDeleteWarning: Warning: You are about to delete the Decentralized Identifier (DID) tied to the selected account. Keep in mind, this action cannot be undone.
payload.oracleDeleteWarning: Warning: You are about to delete the oracle record identified by the above Oracle Document ID. Keep in mind, this action cannot be undone.

monetization.comingPaymentWarning: You're still enjoying Xaman for free, but you're nearing our free limit. To support Xaman's innovation and security, a small in-app payment may be requested soon.
monetization.paymentRequiredMessage: A small payment is required to maintain unlimited access for the next 30 days. Alternatively, Xaman will switch to limited-use mode until your monthly limits reset automatically.
monetization.prePurchaseMessage: You're currently unable to open xApps and sign requests. A small payment is required to unlock 30 days of unrestricted access to Xaman.
monetization.monetizationRequiredForThisFeature: You currently can’t open Sign Requests & xApps: a small payment is required to unlock a 30 days of unrestricted use of Xaman. Developing Xaman, building secure software takes a lot of resources. We hope you will support us continuing to build. If you decide not to: every month your limits will reset, allowing you to open xApps & Sign Requests again.
monetization.noPreviousPurchases: We couldn't find any previous purchases to restore. If you believe this is an error, please contact our support team.
monetization.errorRestorePurchase:
An unexpected error occurred while checking your purchase history.

Please try again later or contact our support team if the issue persists.
monetization.couldNotFetchProductDetails: Error fetching product details. Please try again later or contact support if the issue persists.
monetization.unlockFullFunctionality: Unlock full functionality with a small payment.
monetization.prePurchaseTipIos: Please note that this is a 30 days purchase. Make sure your Apple ID is logged in and your payment information is up-to-date. For issues, use the 'Restore Purchase' button.
monetization.prePurchaseTipAndroid: Please note that this is a 30 days purchase. Make sure your Google account is logged in and your payment information is up-to-date. For issues, use the 'Restore Purchase' button.

errors.unableToLoadTermOfService: Oops! Unable to Retrieve Terms of Service
errors.unableToLoadChangeLogs: Oops! Unable to Retrieve Change Logs
errors.tecPATH_DRY:
The transaction didn't work because funds couldn't be moved between the two accounts, or could not be moved at the requested exchange rate.

This might be because the two accounts involved don't have a connection (TrustLine) that allows them to exchange money with each other, or the transaction didn't work because there wasn't enough money available to move between the two accounts.
errors.tecPATH_PARTIAL: The transaction didn't go through because there weren't enough tokens available to send the complete amount at the requested exchange rate between the two accounts.
errors.tecHOOK_REJECTED:
Rejected by hook on sending or receiving account.

%{hookReturnString}

longDateFormat.LLLL: dddd, D MMMM YYYY h:mm A
